resources.string:
By Clicking Continue you agree to the following:
 - This application will record your phone calls
 - This application might send phone call recordings to 3rd Parties such as (but not limited to) Google for processing
 - These 3rd parties might store your calls
 - There is no guarantee that every fraudulent call will be detected
 ** If you click Cancel the application will terminate
The application will run in the background and record your phone calls and then run some analysis on the recording to figure out if the call was fraudulent or not.
Watch out for notifications after your call ends (might take a couple of seconds).\n The notification should tell you whether the call was fraudulent or not.
